Course_Name: [SoSe 2024] MOOC - Built Environment and Architecture Education for Children and Youth

Messages.Author: Angela Million
Messages.Content: Dear students, as I heard today, the website of PLAYCE is still not online again. Therefor you can find the TOOL Kit as Download on ISIS in English language. Sincerely, Angela Million

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Tomorrow: Mid term Q&A discussion 9-10 am

Messages.Author: Angela Million
Messages.Content: Dear students, this is a kind reminder that we see each other tomorrow for a Mid term Q&A discussion! Make sure that you have started to work on the session before you come to class.... Sincerely, Angela Million

Discussions.Discussion_Name: MOOC BEE: Important Updates on Deliverables and Upcoming Meetings for MOOC on Built Environment and Architecture Education

Messages.Author: Angela Million
Messages.Content: Dear Students, I want to commend you on a hopefully good start to our MOOC on Built Environment and Architecture Education of Children and Youth. As previously in the intro-meeting announced, a briefing has been uploaded containing detailed information about the deliverables for this course. Essentially, you are required to maintain a reflective journal that includes all exercises and assignments. This will be a key component of your 6 ECTS coursework and grading. For further details regarding the expected workload and formatting guidelines, please refer to the information available on ISIS. Additionally, I would like to remind you of the upcoming midterm and final meetings - both being online (ZOOM link on ISIS): - Midterm Meeting: June 4th, online from 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM - Final Meeting: July 16th, online from 9:00 AM to 10:00 AM Please ensure you are actively engaging with the MOOC content by these dates so we can have productive discussions during our meetings. Feel free to use the forum for any questions you have in-between. Best regards, Angela Million
